statements: DELETE FROM ECG_Data WHERE patient_id = 101 AND abnormality_detected = true
DELETE FROM ECG_Data WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND ecg_reading > 5.0
DELETE FROM patient_info WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age > 30;
DELETE FROM ECG_Data WHERE patient_id = 100 AND ecg_timestamp = '2022-01-10 08:30:00';
DELETE FROM Abnormalities WHERE patient_id = 123 AND ecg_timestamp = '2022-01-15 08:30:00' AND abnormality_type = 'Arrhythmia';
DELETE FROM ECG_Data WHERE patient_id = 456 AND ecg_timestamp = '2022-02-20 14:45:00';
DELETE FROM abnormality_detection WHERE patient_id = 101 AND severity > 3
